Relativistic Operations and tranformative updates

Here the relativistic calculations are performed.

The relativistic calculations are performed in the following way:

1

when the player hits "accelerate", the program increases the amount of kinetic Energy by a certain amount.

2

from the sum of kinetic energy, the current velocity is deduced.

3

from the speed, the time delta for the moving non-inertial-system is calculated.
